text.headline:
Become a Computer Science Engineer
Md. Rabbi Amin
text.text: My journey in computer science began at North South University in Bangladesh, filled with the usual uncertainties of choosing a major. Everything changed during my first semester, especially in the [Programming Language (1)] course where I discovered a deep passion for coding, particularly in C programming. This newfound interest significantly shifted my academic focus and set me on a path of exploration and growth.

text.headline:

Technohaven Company Ltd
text.text:
Project Consulting and implementation for Shadharan Bima Corporation. Organizer
member of 2nd Block Chain Olympiad 2021 & Organizer Member of International Block Chain Olympiad
2021.
